import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import * as actions from '../../store/actions/index' const SelleAccordian = props => { return (

{props.name}

FIELDS

{props.a}

VALUES

{props.b}
) } const mapStateToProps = state => { console.log("id is" + state.category.id) return { id: state.category.id } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { return { onClicked: (name, id) => dispatch(actions.updateCategory(name, id)) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(SelleAccordian);
